name: Bounded Box
description:
Made For  GMTK  2019 JAM [ You can move boxes ONLY once ]  Crates can be moved only once      Special crates can be moved in special directions Go to the target while moving boxes

Always keep an eye of moves that you have left !       

The game has been tested and no bugs are found. If you are finding it hard to solve the last puzzles all I can say is that those puzzles are easier than they seem. Game was made for Gmtk jam with the theme : "Only One". The game goes by this theme with : "You can move a box only one time". More levels could not be added because of the time limit of the jam (48h) and the fact that it takes a long time to create puzzles that make sense. If you really enjoyed the game consider leaving a rate.

The game is more enjoyable when played on fullscreen.
